Name: Spacious Snake
About the game: Spacious Snake is a short but well-crafted puzzle game where the objective is to occupy the entire floor of the level. But for that you'll have to solve 20 levels with 2 different mechanics. So you think you can. Why buy Spacious Snake 20 amazing levels Good music Nice pixel art Steam achievements
